playFeature.title: Play with other students in the academy
points: Within the online chess arena, you can play with other students anytime and improve your game. Games are recorded automatically for analysis

solvePuzzles.title: Solve tactics and improve your game
points: We will provide you tailor-made homework puzzles to solve. Keeping solving them and unlock performance insights

liveLessons.title: Online coaching
points: Rain or shine, stay connected with us anytime, anywhere. Collaboratively discuss plans and strategy remotely during tournaments.
Attend online classes with our renowned coaches.

storeGames.title: Store and share your tournament games
points: Store your tournament games in the platform and share it with us for analysis

improveCalc.title: Improve your calculations with Blindfold Chess
points: Play blindfold chess in multiple levels and visualise your calculations better during the game

practicePositions.title: Practice positions with engine
points: Practice positions with the engine and improve your accuracy.
